alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Eastern Union; Western Essex; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 7:23AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Union and southwestern Essex Counties through 800 AM EDT... At 723 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clark, or near Summit, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elizabeth, Plainfield, Orange, Summit, Millburn, Clark, Union, Irvington, Westfield, Maplewood, Scotch Plains, Cranford, Hillside, Roselle and South Orange. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Essex; Eastern Union; Western Essex; Western Union
